thread.title: Rachel Maddow’s Tuesday Night Trump Tax Report Scored Huge Ratings
thread.title_full: Rachel Maddow’s Tuesday Night Trump Tax Report Scored Huge Ratings

author: Josh Feldman
title: Rachel Maddow’s Tuesday Night Trump Tax Report Scored Huge Ratings
text:
Rachel Maddow’s Tuesday Night Trump Tax Report Scored Huge Ratings by Josh Feldman | 6:26 pm, March 16th, 2017 
Rachel Maddow ‘s report on President Trump ‘s 2005 tax returns may have ultimately been a giant letdown , leading to an avalanche of Twitter snark , but it scored some pretty massive ratings. 
Per The Daily Beast , Maddow scored a whopping total of 4.13 million viewers, compared to a little over 3 million for Tucker Carlson and a little over 1 million for Anderson Cooper . 
But not only was Maddow the most-watched cable news program on Tuesday night, but across all of television, it was the number three show at 9 pm across all networks, behind the season finale of NBC’s This Is Us and NCIS: New Orleans . 
Word-of-mouth mostly came through Twitter, where Maddow first made the announcement . 
[ image via screengrab ]
